webservices.webservicexml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <webservice>
<authentication> <type>TOKEN</type> <service_name>eea.reportnet.Reportnet 3 v1</service_name> <version>1</version> <help_url><a href=https://reportnet.europa.eu/>Reportnet 3 home page</a></help_url> <description><p>For use with EEA's Reportnet 3 format (eea.reportnet.reportnet3).</p></description> <markdown_description>For use with EEA's Reportnet 3 format (eea.reportnet.reportnet3).</markdown_description> <connection_description></connection_description> <markdown_connection_description></markdown_connection_description> <access_token_request_format></access_token_request_format> <token_format></token_format> <access_token_url></access_token_url> <authorization_header_format>Authorization: ApiKey [API_KEY]</authorization_header_format> <token_item_name></token_item_name> <expiry_object_key></expiry_object_key> <expiry_time_format> <expiry_type>0</expiry_type> <expiry_format></expiry_format> </expiry_time_format> <use_bearer_token>yes</use_bearer_token> <use_query_string></use_query_string> <nc_gui_fields> <nc_gui_field> <field_name>API_URL</field_name> <gui_line>GUI URL API_URL http%https API URL</gui_line> <gui_line>DEFAULT_VALUE API_URL https://api.reportnet.europa.eu</gui_line> </nc_gui_field> <nc_gui_field> <field_name>API_KEY</field_name> <gui_line>GUI PASSWORD API_KEY API Key</gui_line> </nc_gui_field> <nc_gui_field> <field_name>PROVIDER_ID</field_name> <gui_line>GUI OPTIONAL TEXT PROVIDER_ID Provider ID</gui_line> </nc_gui_field> </nc_gui_fields> <nc_header_fields> <nc_header_key>Accept</nc_header_key> <nc_header_val>application/json</nc_header_val> <nc_header_key>Content-Language</nc_header_key> <nc_header_val>en-US</nc_header_val> <nc_header_key>Content-Type</nc_header_key> <nc_header_val>application/x-www-form-urlencoded</nc_header_val> </nc_header_fields> </authentication>
</webservice>
